markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Vaccha, it is because of not understanding form …

feeling …

perception …

choices …

consciousness …”

SN.33.21–25. Rūpaappaṭivedhādisuttapañcaka (“Five Discourses on Not Penetrating Form, Etc.“)
